title: Dating, Mating & Culture, Geoffrey Miller
description:
Geoffrey Miller is an evolutionary biologist and author of "The Mating Mind". In a previous Rebel Wisdom interview he said that, if politics is downstream of culture, then both are downstream of the mating system, with entire worldviews and communities building themselves around the subject, from redical feminism to incels and MRAs.

In this conversation with Raven Connolly they explore the modern dating landscape and what it means to our culture.

This was recorded in the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire, to join calls like this, check out our membership options: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
